rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming foyer that sets the tone for the Bohemian design. Incorporates local building norms and Vastu principles.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area, featuring a large island, ample storage and energy-efficient appliances, designed for modern living.
Spacious open-living area adjoining the kitchen, filled with natural light and bohemian decor elements.
Master bedroom featuring a serene ambiance aligned with Vastu principles for relaxation and energy flow.
